alert.note: Alert for Chautauqua (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 3:51AM EST until January 09 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of a few hundredths of an inch. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations greater than 8 inches are possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Chautauqua county. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 1 PM EST this afternoon. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Monday morning through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Periods of freezing rain will result in slick roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit ice reports through our website or social media.
